Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong and so find relief from their anger
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= descendant or inhabitant of Midian (מִדְיָן) son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם)
= referent to the time after the event in focus
literally: to return; hence: = to die and rejoin one's ancestors

= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= pattern of behavior required from someone by somebody in authority
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= silvery white metal; ► used, together with copper, for the production of bronze

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a heavy bluish grey soft metal, ≈ associated with heavy weight
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

Node.gloss: to be clean|to be ceremonially clean|to be ritually clean
Node.definition: = state in which people or objects are considered free from contamination, ► as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the objects can be put to normal use
= particle marking a proposition as a condition, and so limiting the scope or impact of what was stated before by making it dependent on another event
= state in which humans are considered unclean because of a flow of blood or contact with a corpse
= causative action by which a human being performs the ritual of removing the state of guilt or uncleanness from another person or object
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= action by which humans remove physical or ritual contamination from their body, or from objects, by dipping it in water
= generic designation for any article of clothing

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

Node.gloss: to be clean|to be ceremonially clean|to be ritually clean
Node.definition: = state in which people or objects are considered free from contamination, ► as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the objects can be put to normal use
= referent to the time after the event in focus
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to take the sum (of a group); hence: = action by which humans try to determine the number of a group of people by having them counted

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= causative action by which people, animals, or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= man; ◄ son of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart

= state of serving as a soldier in active combat
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= a part, share, or number considered in relation to a whole
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state of serving as a soldier in active combat
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a living creature, including both humans and animals, as defined by the life principle that animates it
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= one part of a countable entity that has been divided into two parts

Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= someone who has been appointed to a position of leadership
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
literally: to take the sum (of a group); hence: = action by which humans try to determine the number of a group of people by having them counted

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: head; hence: = the total number of a group of objects or people
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= process by which humans or animals notice that someone or something that is expected to be present or available is missing
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= object made by an artist; ◄ probably made out of precious metal; ► worn as decoration by men (and possibly by women as well) around the arm or wrist
= object made by an artist; ◄ usually made out of precious metal; ► worn on the arm as decoration or charm

= a small circular band with an engraved design on the top; ◄ usually made of gold; ► worn on the finger and used as a marker of identity as well as for personal adornment; ≈ regarded as valuable and attractive
= ring; ◄ made out of silver or gold; ► worn in the ear for personal adornment
exact meaning uncertain: = type of ornament ◄ made of gold

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are required to remove guilt or uncleanness from people or objects, which usually requires a blood sacrifice, or another form of compensation

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built
= an object that serves as a reminder to humans or deities of things that have happened or need to be done
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
